name: Kai Vibes (demo)
description:
Hello and welcome to our world!

This is my first game project from sketch. My idea was modeling my own house and make the player as my cat, the story is based in our own lives and the mission is to protect our vibes from bad energies. 

This is a Demo v.1 for windows and I'll be working on the complete level soon :)

I hope you enjoy the level & music. Feel free to contact me and give your feedback!

(If you have any trouble with the demo game, you can press R at anytime)

If you want to support me ♥
https://www.buymeacoffee.com/hybridflower
